name: Defend Your Buttress
description: Defend Your Buttress is a simple game. You defend your wall to your dying breath. Why? I don't know... Because the evil stick-man want to break your wall and kill you. For some reason.
minimum_requirements: OS: probably runs on Vista, anything newer Processor: Basic processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: On-board graphics is probably enough Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Not a terribly demanding game. I don't have a weak computer to test it on, but there really isn't anything going on in the game that demands power.
